file.content:
openapi: "3.0.1"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Swagger Petstore
paths:
  /pets/{petId}:
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            'application/json':
              schema:
                # this should rather be an object with a "pets" array property
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pet'
  /pets/1234:
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            'application/json':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pet'
components:
  schemas:
    Pet:
      type: object

Error: parse: paths: /pets/{petId}: get: operation "": parse path: path parameter not specified: "petId"
